description: Displays detailed information about a specified job template. Job template stores values of StartJobRun API request in a template and can be used to start a job run. Job template allows two use cases: avoid repeating recurring StartJobRun API request values, enforcing certain values in StartJobRun API request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the job template that will be described.

nested_items.name: jobTemplate
nested_items.description: This output displays information about the specified job template.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the job template.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the job template.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the job template.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the job template was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the job template.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: jobTemplateData
nested_items.description: The job template data which holds values of StartJobRun API request.

nested_items.name: executionRoleArn
nested_items.description: The execution role ARN of the job run.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The release version of Amazon EMR.

nested_items.name: configurationOverrides
nested_items.description: The configuration settings that are used to override defaults configuration.

nested_items.name: applicationConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configurations for the application running by the job run.

nested_items.name: classification
nested_items.description: The classification within a configuration.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: A set of properties specified within a configuration classification.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: configurations
nested_items.description: A list of additional configurations to apply within a configuration object.

nested_items.name: monitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configurations for monitoring.

nested_items.name: persistentAppUI
nested_items.description: Monitoring configurations for the persistent application UI.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchMonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: Monitoring configurations for CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the log group for log publishing.

nested_items.name: logStreamNamePrefix
nested_items.description: The specified name prefix for log streams.

nested_items.name: s3MonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 configuration for monitoring log publishing.

nested_items.name: logUri
nested_items.description: Amazon S3 destination URI for log publishing.

nested_items.name: jobDriver
nested_items.description: Specify the driver that the job runs on. Exactly one of the two available job drivers is required, either sparkSqlJobDriver or sparkSubmitJobDriver.

nested_items.name: sparkSubmitJobDriver
nested_items.description: The job driver parameters specified for spark submit.

nested_items.name: entryPoint
nested_items.description: The entry point of job application.

nested_items.name: entryPointArguments
nested_items.description: The arguments for job application.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: sparkSubmitParameters
nested_items.description: The Spark submit parameters that are used for job runs.

nested_items.name: sparkSqlJobDriver
nested_items.description: The job driver for job type.

nested_items.name: entryPoint
nested_items.description: The SQL file to be executed.

nested_items.name: sparkSqlParameters
nested_items.description: The Spark parameters to be included in the Spark SQL command.

nested_items.name: parameterConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration of parameters existing in the job template.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the job template parameter. Allowed values are: --STRING', --NUMBER'.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value for the job template parameter.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: kmsKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key ARN used to encrypt the job template.

nested_items.name: decryptionError
nested_items.description: The error message in case the decryption of job template fails.
